一般来说第三方登录时，第三方平台已经为您完成用户身份校验，您可以放心让用户登录。\n\n但如果您需要判断用户是否为新用户，可以在授权操作完成后，将用户的信息通过字段“HashMap userInfo”携带给login方法。客户端通过“String userId”执行登录请求，如果服务端判定此userId为未注册用户，可以将userInfo发送给注册接口，获取用户在此平台上的昵称、头像等数据，然后执行注册

2.Are there any risks in taking my blood pressure at home with our monitors?
4.Why is the switch button not working?
5.Why is there no response during the measurement?

1. Is this monitor accurate?


 Yes.
 In order to ensure its accuracy, the monitors have obtained EC medical certification (Europe) as well as FDA approval (USA).

2.\Are there any risks in taking my blood pressure at home with our monitors?


 There are no physical risks associated with taking your blood pressure at home with this product. If you find the measurements uncomfortable, consult with your healthcare professional regarding proper cuff application and tightness.
 You can stop the measurement at any time during the measurement by pressing the STOP button to the right on the App screen to stop inflation.

3. Why does the Bluetooth connection fails?


 There are no physical risks associated with taking your blood pressure at home with this product. If you find the measurements uncomfortable, consult with your healthcare professional regarding proper cuff application and tightness. You can stop the measurement at any time during the measurement by pressing the STOP button to the right on the App screen to stop inflation.

4. Why is the switch button not working?


 The battery level might be too low. Try to recharge the battery.

5. Why is there no response during the measurement?


 Incorrect operation or strong electromagnetic interference may lead to this condition.
 Press the switch button and hold for about 10 seconds to reset the monitor. Reinstall app and reconnect the mobile device to the monitor.

6. Why is the result abnormal?


  The cuff position was not correct or it was not properly tightened. Review the cuff application instructions and retest.
  Body posture was not correct during testing. Review body posture instructions and retest.
  Speaking, moving arm or body or being angry, excited or nervous during test all may lead to abnormal result.
 Retest when calm, avoid speaking or movement during the test.

Privacy Policy Agreement\n
We well understand privacy is one of the most important rights. It’s your trust in us to provide us with your private information, for which we are certain to be serious and responsible.
We believe that all information you supply to us shall be used only to provide you with better services. Hereby we stipulate confidential system for protecting your private information in SCIAN HEALTH WEBSITE, with summary listed as follows:
What kind of private information we may collect?
We would clarify the use of all the information we may ask you to supply. Sometimes we may ask for more information, with the only purpose of better understanding your demand, so as to provide you with more effective service.
The information we need to collect including your name, phone number, blood pressure and heart rate value. It’s your legal right to refuse our request for any information anytime.
Protect your privacy
We will take suitable measures to protect your private information whenever you supply us with sensitive information. Meanwhile we shall take reasonable actions and security means to ensure the safety of existing private information. Without your written permission, we shall never provide any of your private information to an unrelated third party (including companies or individuals), unless there come with government law or legal mandatory requirement.
Right of privacy
We value your right of privacy as important priority for us, therefore SCIAN HEALTH WEBSITE, who published this declaration for privacy right, shall manage all related information comply with the following rules.
SCIAN HEALTH WEBSITE may have to publish private information according to legal mandatory requirement, or believe the good willing of doing so is necessary for reasons as below:
• Accord with legal notice or comply with applicable legal procedure of SCIAN HEALTH WEBSITE
• Protect legal right and property of SCIAN HEALTH WEBSITE users
• Defend public safety of SCIAN HEALTH and all its individual users in an emergency.
Permission
On the premise of your comply with terms and conditions of this Agreement, SCIAN HEALTH empower you with permissions of non-exclusive, non-reauthorization, non-transferable and revocability, so as to make sure you can enjoy our service by download and install applications from SCIAN HEALTH WEBSITE, which is for personal use only instead of commercial use. Without specific written permission from SCIAN HEALTH, it’s strictly forbidden to reproduce, reprint, copy, amend, sale, resale, distribution, nor assess website application or use any its service, nor use for commercial use.
This agreement shall not authorize any intellectual property right of SCIAN HEALTH nor any related third part, unless clearly specified in this agreement.
All the authorization empowered here above is on the premise of your comply with provisions of this Agreement. In case any terms or conditions of this agreement are violated, all the rights specified in this agreement shall be terminated immediately.
While download application and assess service from Application provider (like Apple App Store) or Application distribution platform, you confirm and agree that:
(a) This Agreement is valid only for both parties of the Agreement, while Application provider shall not be involved. We are responsible only for the application instead of Application provider.
(b) Application provider are under no obligation to provide service for maintaining or supporting the application
(c) In case application does not comply with suitable guarantee, Application provider shall not be responsible for any obligation related with application within the maximum range permitted by law.
(d) Application provider shall not be responsible for any claims related with applications of yours or the third party, or your ownership and using applications, including but not limited to the following:
(i) Product Liability Claims；(ii) Any claims about application failed to comply with corresponding laws or regulations, as well as (iii) Any claims about consumer protection or other similar laws；
(e) We shall be responsible for any intellectual property infringement investigations, defense, reconciliation and withdrawal according to this agreement, in case of any claims about application infringing intellectual property of the third party, or ownership and use of this application.
(f) Application provider and its subsidiary is the third beneficiary party, as this Agreement is related with the application you possess. Based on this, after your acceptance on the terms and conditions of this Agreement, Application provider is entitled to connect this Agreement with your possessing application as the third beneficiary party. (Application provider is deemed to accept this right.)
(g) It is your responsibility to comply with all applicable third party service terms
Depends on the third party’s content
The third party provide service in the form of advice, instructions and other information, including but not limited to food, nutrition and exercise data, all of which belongs to the author, and not necessarily worth of reliance.
SCIAN HEALTH shall not guarantee the accuracy, completeness or usefulness of the information from the third party service provider; and (II) SCIAN HEALTH shall not adopt nor accept advice or instructions from the third party service provider, nor take any responsibility.
In any case, SCIAN HEALTH shall not take any responsibility for your loss or damage caused by the release from your trusted service, or receiving or transmitted from the third party or any other content.
You understand and agree to be responsible for the service risk once access to or use this service, meanwhile agree that SCIAN HEALTH and its partners, suppliers and authorized dealers shall not be responsible for any information or subjects to be regarded as offensive, mean or insulting.

鹿得集团是一家集医疗器械的制造，研发，贸易为一体的企业群体，总部设在上海，下属共有7家企业，主要生产基地在温州市永强海滨工业区、南通经济开发区，总面积10万余平方米。集团制造的各类产品，其品质处于国际领先水平，目前已获得CE,FDA,510(K), AAMI-SP10:2002, ISO13485, EN1060-1/2/3等多项国际认证，并且以合理的价格、完善的服务、优越的品质赢得了客户的青睐，产品远销欧洲、美洲、大洋洲、亚洲约90多个国家和地区。集团中高层管理人员均毕业于中国高等学府，大部分来自复旦大学、浙江大学、天津大学等，有着丰富的实际工作经验和企业管理能力。集团致力于产品的研制开发，拥有精良的实验设备，先进的专业技术，各类技术人员50多人，研制的产品已畅销世界各地，获得20多项国家专利，深受广大消费者及业内人士的欢迎。鹿得集团的共生文化，追求与社会、与客户、与员工之间的合理分享，和谐共生，共同发展，为追求人类的健康而不懈努力。

上海煜丰国际贸易有限公司

1. What is blood pressure?


 Blood Pressure is the force or pressure that is exerted by blood pushing against the walls of the blood vessels throughout the body. The heart acts as a pump that circulates the blood forcing the blood through the vessels.

 During each heartbeat，this force moves the blood from the maximum(systolic) pressure to the minimum(diastolic) pressure. The cardiac cycle is this complete series of events within each heartbeat. Blood pressure is measured in millimeters of mercury (mmHg).

2.What do the terms “systolic” and “diastolic” mean?


 Blood pressure is commonly expressed in terms of the systolic pressure
 over the diastolic pressure as 120/80. The highest point of pressure in the heartbeat cycle is the systolic measurement-this is the exerted pressure when the heart contracts. The lowest point occurs between heartbeats and is the diastolic measurement-this is the minimum pressure in the arteries when the heart is at rest.

3.What is normal blood pressure?


 The World Health Organization has established the following globally accepted guidelines for the assessment of blood pressure readings: Optimal blood pressure
 Systolic pressure < 120mmHg
 Diastolic pressure < 80mmHg
 Normal blood pressure
 Systolic pressure 120~129mmHg
 Diastolic pressure 80~84mmHg
 High-normal blood pressure
 Systolic pressure 130~139mmHg
 Diastolic pressure 85~89mmHg
 Mild hypertension
 Systolic pressure 140~159mmHg
 Diastolic pressure 90~99mmHg
 Moderate hypertension
 Systolic pressure 160~179mmHg
 Diastolic pressure 100~109mmHg
 Severe hypertension
 Systolic pressure > 179mmHg
 Diastolic pressure > 110mmHg

4.What is high blood pressure/hypertension?


 High blood pressure, also known as hypertension, is a common condition in which the pressure exerted by the blood pushing against the blood vessels is high enough to potentially cause health problems, including heart disease. This condition is dangerous as it causes the heart to work harder to pump the blood through the body.

5.How do I know if I have high blood pressure?


 Hypertension is often called \‘the silent killer\’ because many people experience little or no symptoms. The name hypertension can be misleading as the prefix \‘hyper\’ may seem to indicate hyperactive, tense or nervous behavior; in fact, a seemingly calm and relaxed individual may still suffer from high blood pressure or hypertension. Home monitoring is a great way to help detect and monitor high blood pressure. Regular readings taken over a period of time can track the history of your results and indicate any changes, fluctuations or elevations in your blood pressure. An individual high reading is not necessarily an indication of hypertension or other health issue. Only your healthcare provider should diagnose any medical condition. iScian Blood Pressure Monitors provide a convenient way to test, track and share your results.

6.Should I consult my healthcare provider about my blood pressure readings?


 If you are already diagnosed with high blood pressure, it is important to see your health care provider on a regular basis. This App is a convenient way to store, track and share your measurements with your healthcare provider so he or she can assist in treating your condition. If you are not already diagnosed with high blood pressure but have concerns about the measurement results, it is suggested to see your healthcare provider for an accurate interpretation and diagnosis of your health.

7.How can I understand and interpret my measurement results?


 You can interpret the measurements using the WHO's blood pressure classification, or consult your healthcare provider what the ideal blood pressure is for your body type, lifestyle and overall health status. A blood pressure measurement can read as artificially elevated for a particular reading. It is important to follow the information provided in your manual to properly prepare for the reading and for proper product use. If you feel your measurement is incorrect, wait several minutes and reattempt the measurement; try to remain calm and relaxed so as to artificially inflate the results.
